meta.description: Determine which children the Zhang family should take on a trip to minimize cost while satisfying various constraints.

sets.name: CHILDREN
sets.description: The children in the Zhang family.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of taking each child on the trip.

vars.name: take
vars.description: Binary variable indicating whether each child is taken on the trip.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[c] * take[c] for c in CHILDREN)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of taking the children.

constraints.name: max_4_children
constraints.description: The couple can take a maximum of 4 children.

constraints.name: take_ginny
constraints.description: Ginny must be taken on the trip.

constraints.name: harry_not_fred
constraints.description: If Harry is taken, Fred cannot be taken.

constraints.name: harry_not_george
constraints.description: If Harry is taken, George cannot be taken.

constraints.name: george_must_fred
constraints.description: If George is taken, Fred must also be taken.

constraints.name: george_must_hermione
constraints.description: If George is taken, Hermione must also be taken.

constraints.name: at_least_3_children
constraints.description: The couple must take at least 3 children.
